text: Paindong Union () is a union of Fatikchhari Upazila of Chittagong District. ==Geography== * Area : 7,209 acres (29.17 km2.)। ==Location== * North: Bhujpur Thana and Manikchhari Upazila * East: Kanchan nagar Union * South: Sundarpur Union * West: Harualchari Union ==References== * Paindong Union details, lcgbangladesh.org Category:Unions of Fatikchhari Upazila
title: Paindong Union
